description:
The lambs are caught up in a shocking plot to destroy the world, travelling through the chaotic timeline to save the disturbed time and space. In this adventure, they travel through history, back to the past, to help one by one affected by the old friends, but also in the process, to discover some of the year hidden behind the truth, in the gradually approaching extinction of the crisis, the sheep how to protect the friends in front of them?
source: bgm.tv/deepl

BAIDU_BAIKE: 喜羊羊与灰太狼之跨时空救兵

titles.title: Xi Yang Yang Yu Hui Tailang: Kua Shikong Jiu Bing
喜羊羊与灰太狼之跨时空救兵
